core:processNote.core:description: Force configure is only supported when reader is online, and applies existing configuration only. If configuration has changed must use Set Configuration. Set Configuration forces reload anyway if config has changed.
Support input event property to force reconfiguration of ICC Reader. Force configure is only supported when reader is online.

core:param.value: Failed to change layout on reload config
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:action.core:comment: Record the cash tender key that matches the store's base currency.
Clear the flag which may be set by the background config monitor

core:assignAction.core:comment: Support input event property to force reconfiguration of ICC Reader. Force configure is only supported when reader is online, and must only do this is configation has not changed otherwise it will get done twice.

core:eventLink.core:comment: Don't set layout if being run from background process.
